text: <@U0KM61BCP> :confused: which creds do you mean? it's the `mycreds.json` that I will need to configure- isn't it? do the creds come from my machine?
I believe that you need to configure the membersrvc.yaml to also include those mycreds.json values so that the users are known.
I don't see a file called `membersrvc.yaml`

attachments.title: hyperledger/fabric
attachments.text: Read-only historic repo. Current development is at <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/admin/projects/fabric> . pull requests not accepted

text: <@U0UHG4VP1> thanks for the heads up on the gerrit HTTP passwords
